data.actual_result: You are unable to control your permissions and require assistance from an admin
data.expected_result: You should be able to control the permissions
data.short_description: New (private) channels within a category doesn't respect default permissions
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a user in which has access to manage channel and permissions but only for the category  - Create a new PRIVATE channel using this account  - Try and edit the permissions
